ECI finds mismatch in his voter ID; begins probe</title><description><![CDATA[Tejashwi Yadav, an RJD leader, claimed his name was missing from Bihar's voter list, alleging a conspiracy. However, the Election Commission of India (ECI) refuted this, stating his name exists with EPIC number RAB0456228, used since 2015. The ECI is investigating a second EPIC number Yadav presented, RAB2916120, which appears non-existent in their records, raising forgery concerns.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-rjd-leaders-name-missing-from-bihar-poll-roll-claim-prompts-ec-to-look-into-forgery-what-poll-panel-said/articleshow/123064312.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-rjd-leaders-name-missing-from-bihar-poll-roll-claim-prompts-ec-to-look-into-forgery-what-poll-panel-said/articleshow/123064312.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 21:28:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123064439,imgsize-45966.cms"/></item><item><title>US escalates war on marriage fraud in green card applications, updates its policy manual</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/uscis-escalates-war-on-marriage-fraud-in-green-card-applications-updates-its-policy-manual/articleshow/123059327.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/uscis-escalates-war-on-marriage-fraud-in-green-card-applications-updates-its-policy-manual/articleshow/123059327.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 22:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LUBNA KABLY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="427980" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123059366,imgsize-427980.cms"/></item><item><title>Palestine statehood: What's keeping the dream a dream?</title><description><![CDATA[France, the UK, and Canada's support for a Palestinian state highlights growing international frustration with Israel, particularly regarding Gaza. Despite this symbolic backing and increasing isolation for Israel, a viable Palestinian state faces significant obstacles. These include a lack of unified leadership, Israeli settlement expansion, and Prime Minister Netanyahu's staunch opposition, making the prospect of statehood more distant than ever.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/palestine-statehood-more-countries-back-two-state-solution-whats-keeping-the-dream-a-dream/articleshow/123064634.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/palestine-statehood-more-countries-back-two-state-solution-whats-keeping-the-dream-a-dream/articleshow/123064634.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 21:57:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1231591" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123064679,imgsize-1231591.cms"/></item><item><title>Mark Zuckerberg meets 24-yr-old AI researcher who rejected Meta's $125m job offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance led them to recruit 24-year-old Matt Deitke, initially offering $125 million, which he declined. Zuckerberg's personal intervention resulted in a revised $250 million package, including potential $100 million in the first year. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>'Must remain alert': PM Modi's 'Swadeshi' appeal for Indians; days after Trump's 25% tariff</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi has called for a renewed focus on 'Swadeshi' amid global economic instability. Speaking in Varanasi, he urged Indians to prioritise locally-made products, emphasising the need for national unity and economic self-reliance. Modi cautioned against inward-looking trade policies of other nations and stressed India's commitment to becoming the world's third-largest economy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/must-remain-alert-pm-modis-swadeshi-appeal-for-indians-days-after-trumps-25-tariff/articleshow/123063410.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/must-remain-alert-pm-modis-swadeshi-appeal-for-indians-days-after-trumps-25-tariff/articleshow/123063410.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 19:51:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45098" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063456,imgsize-45098.cms"/></item><item><title>Shubman Gill, KL Rahul, Ravindra Jadeja create historic feat in England</title><description><![CDATA[In a historic moment for Indian Test cricket, Shubman Gill, KL Rahul, and Ravindra Jadeja have each surpassed 500 runs in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series. Shubman Gill leads with 754 runs. KL Rahul has contributed 532 runs. Ravindra Jadeja has reached 515 runs. Their combined efforts highlight India's batting prowess and adaptability throughout the series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-shubman-gill-kl-rahul-ravindra-jadeja-create-historic-feat-in-england-never-seen-before-in-test-cricket/articleshow/123064671.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-shubman-gill-kl-rahul-ravindra-jadeja-create-historic-feat-in-england-never-seen-before-in-test-cricket/articleshow/123064671.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 22:04:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1261461" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123064767,imgsize-1261461.cms"/></item><item><title>Teen girl with 75% burns dies in Delhi; Odisha CM expresses shock</title><description><![CDATA[A 15-year-old girl from Odisha, who suffered severe burns after being set on fire by unidentified individuals on June 19, has tragically passed away despite intensive medical care at AIIMS New Delhi. The victim, who sustained over 75% burn injuries, was initially treated in Bhubaneswar before being transferred to Delhi.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/minor-girl-set-ablaze-in-puri-dies-aiims-confirms-75-burns-odisha-cm-expresses-shock-miscreants-still-at-large/articleshow/123063874.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/minor-girl-set-ablaze-in-puri-dies-aiims-confirms-75-burns-odisha-cm-expresses-shock-miscreants-still-at-large/articleshow/123063874.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 20:27:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="115746" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063914,imgsize-115746.cms"/></item><item><title>LinkedIn cofounder, Silicon Valley's biggest democrat supporter says: There's a problem with Blue states and…</title><description><![CDATA[Reid Hoffman admits that the Democratic Party alienated Silicon Valley. This drove tech leaders towards Donald Trump. He says attacks on cryptocurrency and Big Tech companies caused this shift. Hoffman points to California's regulations as a problem. He notes companies like Aurora Innovation tested in Texas due to better rules. He urges Democrats to adopt business-friendly policies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/linkedin-founder-reid-hoffman-silicon-valleys-biggest-democrat-supporter-says-theres-a-problem-with-blue-states-and-they-need-to-/articleshow/123018971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/linkedin-founder-reid-hoffman-silicon-valleys-biggest-democrat-supporter-says-theres-a-problem-with-blue-states-and-they-need-to-/articleshow/123018971.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:21:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40280" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018898,imgsize-40280.cms"/></item><item><title>'No oil reserves in Pak': Baloch leader says Trump 'gravely misled' by Asim Munir</title><description><![CDATA[Baloch leader Mir Yar Baloch cautioned Donald Trump in an open letter, asserting that General Asim Munir misled him regarding Balochistan's resource ownership. He clarified that the oil, gas, and mineral reserves Trump mentioned belong to the 'Republic of Balochistan,' not Pakistan. Balochistan opposes any exploitation of its resources without the Baloch people's consent, emphasizing their sovereignty. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/you-have-been-gravely-misled-by-asim-munir-baloch-leaders-open-letter-to-trump-oil-reserves-not-in-pakistan/articleshow/123063382.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/you-have-been-gravely-misled-by-asim-munir-baloch-leaders-open-letter-to-trump-oil-reserves-not-in-pakistan/articleshow/123063382.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 19:42:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35556" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063439,imgsize-35556.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Ravindra Jadeja creates history, becomes first Indian to score ...</title><description><![CDATA[Ravindra Jadeja etched his name in history, becoming the first Indian to score 500+ runs in a Test series at No.6 or lower, surpassing VVS Laxman's record. His crucial innings at The Oval, along with Yashasvi Jaiswal's century and Akash Deep's resilient knock, propelled India to a commanding lead against England.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-ravindra-jadeja-creates-history-becomes-first-indian-to-score-/articleshow/123064429.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-ravindra-jadeja-creates-history-becomes-first-indian-to-score-/articleshow/123064429.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 21:26:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83502" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123064441,imgsize-83502.cms"/></item><item><title>Pakistan earthquake: 5.4 magnitude tremor jolts several areas; no damage reported</title><description><![CDATA[A 5.4 magnitude earthquake jolted Pakistan early Saturday, triggering widespread panic across Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Punjab, and Islamabad. The epicentre was traced to Afghanistan's Hindukush region at a depth of 102 kilometres. Tremors were felt in various Afghan and Tajik regions. While no casualties or property damage were reported, residents rushed outdoors reciting Quranic verses.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-earthquake-5-4-magnitude-tremor-jolts-several-areas-no-damage-reported/articleshow/123064162.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-earthquake-5-4-magnitude-tremor-jolts-several-areas-no-damage-reported/articleshow/123064162.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 20:59:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="776781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123064181,imgsize-776781.cms"/></item><item><title>Google CEO Sundar Pichai to employees: ‘I think we have to accomplish more…’</title><description><![CDATA[Google's CEO Sundar Pichai and executives like Brian Saluzzo are urging employees to accelerate the integration of AI into their workflows, aiming for increased productivity and efficiency. This push includes internal AI tools like Cider and training programs developed with DeepMind, such as "Building with Gemini," to enhance software engineers' capabilities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-employees-i-think-we-have-to-accomplish-more/articleshow/123051998.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-to-employees-i-think-we-have-to-accomplish-more/articleshow/123051998.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:20:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="18668" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123052356,imgsize-18668.cms"/></item><item><title>Eye on China: India deploys warships to Southeast; boosts military ties</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-deploys-warships-to-southeast-asia-to-boost-military-ties/articleshow/123063006.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-deploys-warships-to-southeast-asia-to-boost-military-ties/articleshow/123063006.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 19:02:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1025763" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063011,imgsize-1025763.cms"/></item><item><title>Just 54 runs! Gill's record-breaking series tarnished only by London low</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill had a remarkable Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series. He scored 754 runs, averaging 83.78. Gill hit four centuries, equaling records. He surpassed Gavaskar's record for most runs as an Indian captain in a series. However, Gill faced challenges in London. His scores at Lord's and The Oval were significantly lower than elsewhere. Despite this, Gill's overall performance cemented his legacy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/anderson-tendulkar-trophy-just-54-runs-shubman-gills-record-breaking-series-tarnished-only-by-london-low/articleshow/123063777.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/anderson-tendulkar-trophy-just-54-runs-shubman-gills-record-breaking-series-tarnished-only-by-london-low/articleshow/123063777.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 20:19:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44706" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063827,imgsize-44706.cms"/></item><item><title>National Sister’s Day 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages, and quotes to share</title><description><![CDATA[National Sisters' Day, celebrated on August 3rd, 2025, is a special occasion to honor the unique bond shared between sisters. The day encourages acknowledging the unwavering support, shared memories, and deep connection that defines sisterhood. It offers an opportunity to express appreciation through heartfelt messages, thoughtful gestures, and quality time, reinforcing the invaluable role sisters play in each other's lives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/national-sisters-day-2025-top-50-wishes-messages-images-greetings-card-gifs-whatsapp-status-facebook-status-and-quotes-to-share-with-your-sister/articleshow/123045353.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/national-sisters-day-2025-top-50-wishes-messages-images-greetings-card-gifs-whatsapp-status-facebook-status-and-quotes-to-share-with-your-sister/articleshow/123045353.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 20:10:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1379110" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123045878,imgsize-1379110.cms"/></item><item><title>Hailee Steinfeld's latest workout photos break the internet</title><description><![CDATA[While Josh Allen focuses on football, Hailee Steinfeld prioritizes her well-being through fitness and mindfulness. Hailee embraces balance, letting go of past body image struggles and finding joy in her wellness journey, setting an example of inner strength.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/hailee-steinfelds-latest-workout-photos-break-the-internet-as-josh-allen-returns-to-bills-camp/articleshow/123053666.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/hailee-steinfelds-latest-workout-photos-break-the-internet-as-josh-allen-returns-to-bills-camp/articleshow/123053666.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 06:12:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15984" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123053697,imgsize-15984.cms"/></item><item><title>‘He wants her to feel safe’: Travis Kelce prioritizing Taylor Swift’s privacy</title><description><![CDATA[Travis Kelce recently shared rare photos with Taylor Swift on social media, a move reportedly discussed with the pop star beforehand. Sources reveal Kelce prioritized Swift's comfort and privacy, ensuring she approved of the images before posting. While Kelce gears up for the NFL season and Swift remains out of the public eye, their relationship nears the two-year mark.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/he-wants-her-to-feel-safe-travis-kelce-is-reportedly-focused-on-prioritizing-taylor-swifts-privacy-amid-ongoing-drama/articleshow/123051594.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/he-wants-her-to-feel-safe-travis-kelce-is-reportedly-focused-on-prioritizing-taylor-swifts-privacy-amid-ongoing-drama/articleshow/123051594.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 01:39:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="821068" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123051592,imgsize-821068.cms"/></item><item><title>Gabrielle Union on menopause: 'It makes it hard' — motherhood now more emotional, exhausting</title><description><![CDATA[Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union discussed her experience with menopause and motherhood. She and Dwyane Wade welcomed their daughter, Kaavia, via surrogacy in 2018. Union had previously experienced miscarriages.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 00:31:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1290157" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123050873,imgsize-1290157.cms"/></item><item><title>'Sometimes distance teaches you' – Saina’s latest post hints at fresh start with Kashyap</title><description><![CDATA[Just weeks after announcing their separation, Olympic medalist Saina Nehwal and her husband Parupalli Kashyap have hinted at a reconciliation. The missing poster, featuring Lychee Berry's adventures, went viral, prompting both sympathy and gentle teasing online. Despite the irreplaceable nature of the original, a fellow Labubu enthusiast gifted her a near-identical doll, offering solace and new adventures.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/shes-pink-has-scuffs-on-face-eats-popcorn-chicken-labubu-doll-goes-missing-in-us-city-woman-offers-cash-a-poem/articleshow/123063454.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/shes-pink-has-scuffs-on-face-eats-popcorn-chicken-labubu-doll-goes-missing-in-us-city-woman-offers-cash-a-poem/articleshow/123063454.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 19:55:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1167446" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123063525,imgsize-1167446.cms"/></item><item><title>'Was tortured to name PM Modi, Yogi & Bhagwat': Pragya Thakur's big claim in Malegaon blast case</title><description><![CDATA[Sadhvi Pragya states coercion in naming leaders. A special NIA court acquitted all seven accused in the 2008 Malegaon blast case. The blast resulted in six deaths and numerous injuries. The court cited lack of evidence against Pragya Thakur. Investigations initially pointed to "saffron extremists". The case saw twists, including allegations against the NIA.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/malegaon-blast-case-sadhvi-pragya-says-she-was-tortured-to-name-pm-modi-forced-to-lie-about-yogi/articleshow/123060419.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/malegaon-blast-case-sadhvi-pragya-says-she-was-tortured-to-name-pm-modi-forced-to-lie-about-yogi/articleshow/123060419.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 15:46:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51604" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123060579,imgsize-51604.cms"/></item><item><title>First in Test History! They cautioned against physical contact, citing potential escalation and the importance of respecting boundaries in a non-contact sport.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-stay-out-of-the-way-ravi-shastri-mike-atherton-criticise-akash-deeps-send-off-to-ben-duckett/articleshow/123060449.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-stay-out-of-the-way-ravi-shastri-mike-atherton-criticise-akash-deeps-send-off-to-ben-duckett/articleshow/123060449.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 15:40:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41424" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123060547,imgsize-41424.cms"/></item><item><title>Nayara Energy hit by EU sanctions; looks at Indian oil companies to offload exports</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-backed-nayara-energy-looks-at-indias-state-run-oil-companies-to-offload-petrol-diesel-exports/articleshow/123058165.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-backed-nayara-energy-looks-at-indias-state-run-oil-companies-to-offload-petrol-diesel-exports/articleshow/123058165.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 15:30:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="121393" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123060366,imgsize-121393.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saiyaara' box office: Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda’s film earns around Rs 3 cr on Saturday</title><description><![CDATA[Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda's 'Saiyaara,' directed by Mohit Suri, continues its box office reign, nearing Rs 300 crore after 16 days. Despite new releases like 'Son of Sardaar 2' and 'Dhadak 2,' 'Saiyaara' maintains a strong performance, outperforming 'Dhadak 2' in early earnings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-16-live-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-paddas-film-continues-to-shine-outperforms-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-and-collects-around-rs-3-crore-on-saturday/articleshow/123061582.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-16-live-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-paddas-film-continues-to-shine-outperforms-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-and-collects-around-rs-3-crore-on-saturday/articleshow/123061582.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 17:00:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36268" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123061573,imgsize-36268.cms"/></item><item><title>'Gives bowlers no time to settle': Sidhu compares Jaiswal's impact to Sehwag</title><description><![CDATA[Navjot Singh Sidhu lauded Yashasvi Jaiswal, drawing parallels to Virender Sehwag's impactful opening style. Sidhu highlighted Jaiswal's aggressive yet composed approach after his quickfire fifty against England. He emphasised Jaiswal's ability to dominate bowlers and put his team in a winning position, praising his technical strengths and comparing his impact to Sehwag's after Sunil Gavaskar.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-gives-bowlers-no-time-to-settle-navjot-sidhu-compares-yashasvi-jaiswals-impact-to-virender-sehwag/articleshow/123061051.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-gives-bowlers-no-time-to-settle-navjot-sidhu-compares-yashasvi-jaiswals-impact-to-virender-sehwag/articleshow/123061051.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 16:20:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37426" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123061082,imgsize-37426.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    </item>
